original_text: But if the priest buy any soul with his money, he shall eat of it, and he that is born in his house: they shall eat of his meat.
korean_text: 그러나 제사장이 그의 돈으로 어떤 사람을 샀으면 그는 그것을 먹을 것이며 그의 집에서 출생한 자도 그렇게 하여 그들이 제사장의 음식을 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: But if the priest buy any soul with his money
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 제사장이 자기 돈으로 어떤 영혼을 산다면

sentences.original_text: and he that is born in his house
they shall eat of his meat
